tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE electric_vehicles_resale_value (
    vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_brand VARCHAR(50),
    vehicle_model VARCHAR(50),
    manufacturing_year INT,
    resale_value DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE electric_vehicles (
    vehicle_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    brand VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    model VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    year INT NOT NULL,
    resale_value DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE vehicle_sales (
    sale_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT REFERENCES electric_vehicles(vehicle_id),
    sale_date DATE NOT NULL,
    sale_price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    owner_id INT REFERENCES owners(owner_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ElectricVehicleResaleValue (
    vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_name VARCHAR(50),
    manufacturer VARCHAR(50),
    year INT,
    resale_value DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE VehicleModel (
    model_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_name VARCHAR(50),
    manufacturer_id INT,
    production_year INT,
    vehicle_type VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE ElectricVehicles (
    vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    brand VARCHAR(50),
    model VARCHAR(50),
    year INT,
    resale_value DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE EVSales (
    sale_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT,
    sale_date TIMESTAMP,
    sale_price DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (vehicle_id) REFERENCES ElectricVehicles(vehicle_id)
);

CREATE TABLE EVServiceRecords (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT,
    service_date DATE,
    service_description VARCHAR(200),
    FOREIGN KEY (vehicle_id) REFERENCES ElectricVehicles(vehicle_id)
);
